data.title: Environmental Resources Management (ERM)
data.meta_description: ERM established a permanent presence in Belgium in 1995 and has offices in Antwerp and Brussels
data.text:
ERM established a permanent presence in Belgium in 1995 and has offices in Antwerp and Brussels, employing over 50 engineers, technicians and environmental and safety experts.

The Belgian-based ERM team provides solutions and strategic advice to business and the public sector on how best to handle both current and future environmental and natural resource issues.

ERM consultants perform environmental impact assessments in the Flemish, Brussels and Walloon region and have an in-depth knowledge of the different regulatory systems. We have accredited environmental coordinators and safety experts among our staff. ERM is a recognized expert in soil investigations and remediation in all of the three regions. We are also ISO9001:2008 certified.

Our soil investigation and remediation team has expertise to find the best solutions to solve environmental problems. The auditing team is experienced in both due diligence and compliance audits, assisting clients estimate costs and prioritize actions, to improve regulatory compliance and performance on environment, health and safety.

We regularly assist our clients with water and energy efficiency initiatives, carbon foot printing and supply chain exercises. We provide services on sustainability reporting and verification, safety culture, management systems, and risk assessments. Our international footprint combined with this local expertise puts us in a unique position to serve our clients efficiently.
